note: Burned out Queer Greenie. Aussie with an English accent. Avoiding dealing with *gestures at everything * by concentrating on regenerating one small patch of riparian rainforest in NSW.

fields.name: Atmospheric CO2 when I was born
Text for images
fields.value:
Avatar: Cheerful looking white bloke, late fifties, mirrored sunnies with a large pandanus in the background.
Header image: a forest floor with leaf litter and a blue quandong fruit, the size of a cherry, centred.

fields.value:
The greatest shortcoming of the human race is our inability to understand the exponential function.
Albert A. Bartlett
